thread.title: Cubs fan, 100, hopes this is the year
thread.title_full: Cubs fan, 100, hopes this is the year

title: Cubs fan, 100, hopes this is the year
text:
Cubs fan, 100, hopes this is the year Posted: Updated: Loretta Dolan waited a century to get to her first Cubs playoff game, and she wasn't disappointed. (Source: WBBM/CNN) 
CHICAGO (WBBM/CNN) - You'd be hard-pressed to find a sweeter Chicago cubs fan than Loretta Dolan. 
She has been waiting more than a century to see a postseason Cubs victory. 
Monday she attended her first playoff game at Wrigley Field. That's where she recalled decades and decades of tracking the cubs. 
"I'm 101 in two months," Dolan said. "We used to take our own lunch and pop, and we never paid anything. We sit and cry when they don't win." 
Dolan was treated to a dramatic playoff victory Monday. 
The Cubs beat their archrivals, the St. Louis Cardinals, to take a 2-1 lead in the National League Division Series. 
On Tuesday, the Cubs advanced to the National League Championship Series with a 6-4 win, the team's first-ever series clincher at home.
